english.segment1: Once upon a time I was faithless, running blind. Thru the Valley of the Lost. So now you find it rather strange. When you hear me claim the name. Of the one who bears the cross
english.segment2: CHORUS: And I say I believe in You now. A new light is showing me how I. used to walk in the shadows of doubt. But I believe in you now
english.segment3: Will there ever come a day. When you follow in the way. Of the truth that sets you free. To where the thunder of a voice. And the echo of a choice. Will bring you to your knees
english.segment4: No longer running thru the night. A conversion to the light. Giving way to disbelief. And you say
